@@ -1,1233 +0,0 @@
-from abc import ABC, abstractmethod%0A%0Aclass Animal(ABC):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        self.nome = nome%0A%0A    def apresentar_nome(self):%0A        print(f%22Eu sou um(a) %7Bself.nome%7D!%22)%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def mover(salf):%0A        pass%0A%0A%0Aclass Leao(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        print(%22Roooaaarr%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22O le%C3%A3o caminha pela savana%22)%0A%0A%0Aclass Elefante(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        print(%22Prrruu%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22O elefante anda pesadamente%22)%0A%0A    %0Aclass Cobra(Animal):%0A    def __init__(self, nome: str):%0A        super().__init__(nome)%0A%0A    def fazer_som(self):%0A        print(%22Sssss%22)%0A%0A    def mover(self):%0A        print(%22A rasteja pelo ch%C3%A3o%22)%0A%0Adef apresentar(animal: Animal):%0A    animal.apresentar_nome()%0A    animal.fazer_som()%0A    animal.mover()%0A    print(f%22Tipo do objeto: %7Btype(animal)%7D%22)%0A    print(%22-%22 * 40)%0A%0A%0A#testes%0A%0Aanimais = %5B%0A    Leao(%22Le%C3%A3o Simba%22),%0A    Elefante(%22Elefante Dumbo%22),%0A    Cobra(%22Cobra Naja%22)%0A%5D%0A%0Afor a in animais:%0A    apresentar(a)
